full_text:
Case 1:20-cr-00330-PAE Document 763 Filed 08/10/22 Page 123 of 197 2664 LCHVMAX4
1 Q. That was going to be my next question.
2 THE COURT: Just to make sure I'm right, this is RR; correct?
3 MR. PAGLIUCA: It is RR, your Honor.
4 THE COURT: Okay.
5 MR. PAGLIUCA: We can take that down.
6 Q. That's all I'm doing with the flight records. I just have a few more questions, Dr. Dubin.
7 THE COURT: Go ahead.
8 Q. Dr. Dubin, during the 1994 to 2004 time frame, were you ever introduced to any other person named Eva who was dating Mr. Epstein?
9 A. Not that I can recall.
10 Q. Were you ever introduced to anyone else named Eva who had a close relationship, to your knowledge, with Mr. Epstein?
11 A. Not that I can recall.
12 Q. Okay. And I need to ask a couple of final questions about the person that we identified in Exhibit 12, the person that we're calling Jane. And I apologize for asking these questions, okay?
13 Have you ever been in a group sexual encounter with the person we are calling Jane?
14 A. Absolutely not.
15 Q. Okay. Have you ever been in a group sexualized massage with Jane?
16 SOUTHERN DISTRICT REPORTERS, P.C. (212) 805-0300 DOJ-OGR-00014229
